Name: CargoBayExtension
Description: Increases the total storage of the Transport ship, allowing more Shipments or Artifacts to be carried at once.

Name: ShipmentComputer
Description: Automatically picks up shipments from intermediate waypoints, if those shipments' destination matches any of the ship's subsequent waypoints. Automatically picked up shipments add a bonus to their reward.\n\nAfter this module is unlocked, selecting any object that holds shipments will reveal numeric indicators showing where the shipments are headed.

Name: TradeBoost
Description: While active, increases payout on shipment delivery.

Name: MiningBoost
Description: Provides a temporary boost to Hydrogen collection speed.

Name: EMP
Description: Disables all ships, rockets and Cerberus Stations within the affected area for a short period of time, including the ship that triggered the EMP. Disabled ships do not move or fire, but can still activate Modules.

Name: RemoteRepair
Description: Repairs a constant amount of hitpoints per second, shared among all damaged non-enemy ships within range.

Name: AlphaShield
Description: Absorbs incoming damage until it is depleted or the activation timer runs out.

Name: DeltaShield
Description: Absorbs incoming damage until it is depleted or the activation timer runs out. Owner ship travels faster while the shield is active.

Name: StrongShield
Description: Absorbs incoming damage until it is depleted or the activation timer runs out.

Name: Teleport
Description: After the Activation Delay, the ship teleports to the designated target, which must be within teleportation radius. Cannot teleport inside Barrier areas created by enemy ships.

Name: TimeWarp
Description: Speeds up time in a radius around the ship. Affects travel times, combat and artifact pickup speed.\n\nAn object in range of multiple Time Warps is only affected by the highest level one.

Name: RedStarLifeExtender
Description: Adds a small amount of time to a Red Star's life when activated near the star.

Name: WeakBattery
Description: A weak weapon that does damage to a single target at a time.

Name: Battery
Description: Does damage to a single target at a time.

Name: Laser
Description: A powerful weapon that does increasingly higher damage the longer it stays focused on a single target.

Name: Stealth
Description: Activating ship evades enemy ship fire completely. It will not fire on enemies, or be fired on, for the duration of the effect.

Name: HydrogenBayExtension
Description: Increases the maximum amount of Hydrogen that a Miner ship can carry.

Name: RemoteMining
Description: Simultaneously mines Hydrogen from all asteroid fields in the same sector, at reduced speed.

Name: Unity
Description: Increases Damage Per Second for the owner ship when other allied players have ships present in the same sector. The increase is proportional to the number of allied players with ships in the sector.

Name: Fortify
Description: Reduces direct weapon damage received. All Cerberus ships in the sector move toward the owner. Enemy ships and bases prefer firing on the owner over all other potential targets.

Name: Salvage
Description: Instantly restores a percentage of hull strength each time any ship (other than Cerberus Ghost) is destroyed in the same sector.

Name: Suppress
Description: Prevents a single enemy ship from firing for a small period of time.

Name: ShipmentDrone
Description: Launches a drone that will automatically pick up and deliver shipments when possible. The drone can only cross sectors if they are connected with an active Warp Lane.\n\nThe drone loads shipments to a single destination at a time. When it drops off more than one shipment, the entire delivery will yield a credit reward bonus proportional to the number of additional shipments delivered.

Name: Destiny
Description:
Does massive area damage to all enemy ships in range. Initiator ship instantly jumps to a random asteroid in the star system. If there are no asteroids left, DESTINY cannot be activated.

After the jump, the ship stays disabled for a short period of time.

Can only be activated if there are enemy ships in the sector.

Name: PassiveShield
Description: A shield that is always active and can regenerate over time.\n\nThe shield only starts regenerating after it has stopped receiving damage for an amount of time equal to the Regeneration Delay.

Name: MirrorShield
Description: Applies a percentage of the damage taken by this shield back to the attacker.

Name: HydrogenUpload
Description: Instantly uploads a percentage of collected Hydrogen to your Empire's reserves, without needing to return to a planet.

Name: MiningUnity
Description: Increases mining speed for the activating ship, if other players are also mining in the same sector. The increase is proportional to the number of other players mining in the sector.

Name: MassBattery
Description: Simultaneously fires on multiple enemies within firing range.

Name: DualLaser
Description: Fires a laser beam against up to two enemies within range. Damage ramps up over time if both beams are active.

Name: GuardianBattery
Description: A weak weapon that does damage to a single target at a time.

Name: Barrier
Description: Creates a force field around the ship. Enemy ships and most rocket types cannot move while inside the force field. Enemy ships cannot use any object inside the effect area as a target for the Teleport module.

Name: Impulse
Description: Provides the owner a quick boost that helps it travel faster along its current route.

Name: Barrage
Description: A battery that does additional damage to its single target when there are more enemy ships in the sector.\n\nCerberus Ghosts do not count as enemies for additional damage.

Name: TradeBurst
Description: Counts shipments delivered during the activation period. After a minimum threshold is met, every new Credits shipment delivered by the owner ship while the module is still active will yield a bonus reward.

Name: Leap
Description: The owner ship initiates teleportation to the closest ally ship engaged in combat, anywhere in the current star system. After the activation delay period, and if the targeted ally is still alive, the owner ship will jump to the object closest to the ally ship. After the jump, both the owner ship and the ally ship are disabled for a small period of time.

Name: Vengeance
Description: Starts activating automatically when the owner ship drops below the Hull Strength Threshold. Once the Activation Delay passes, and if the owner ship is still not destroyed, a massive explosion will apply Area damage to all enemy ships in range.

Name: ShipmentBeam
Description: Instantly loads the lowest value shipments from any target outpost in the star system. Does not work with Artifacts or Relics.

Name: Sanctuary
Description: When the owner ship is about to be destroyed during combat or a Supernova, it jumps back to its home system instead. Any cargo on the ship will be lost.\n\nBattleships that get destroyed in a Red Star with Sanctuary equipped will not be able to return to the same star.

Name: Crunch
Description: Instantly collects Hydrogen from all asteroid fields in the current sector (limited by the Max Amount and the Miner ship's total capacity).

Name: Recall
Description: Allows the Transport ship to teleport to any Trade Station in the current star system.

Name: AlphaRocket
Description: A fast but weak Rocket that can be launched towards a single fixed target. The Rocket explodes and does Area damage to all enemy ships when it reaches its destination.\n\nEnemy ships can fire on the Rocket using normal targeting rules. No damage is applied if the rocket is destroyed before it reaches its destination.

Name: Enrich
Description: Instantly increases the amount of Hydrogen stored on all asteroids in the sector. Cannot be used on the same sector more frequently than once per day.

Name: Rush
Description: Increases the speed of the owner Transport ship when it carries any shipments destined to the ship's next waypoint. The speed increase is proportional to the number of shipments destined to the next waypoint.

Name: Genesis
Description: Instantly creates new asteroid fields on the Miner's current sector.\n\nDoes not work on sectors with Jump Gates on White Stars.

Name: Entrust
Description: Allows the owner transport ship to instantly teleport its cargo to another transport ship in range. Works with Shipments and fully loaded Artifacts and Relics.

Name: Offload
Description: When active, the Transport ship will deliver all of its shipments upon arriving on a Trade Station, regardless of the shipments' actual destination. Shipments not originally destined to the Trade Station will yield a reduced payoff.

Name: AreaShield
Description: Absorbs hull damage taken by any allied ship or rocket in the effect area, including Transports and Miners.

Name: OmegaShield
Description: Absorbs hull damage taken by any Cerberus ship in the effect area

Name: AlphaDrone
Description: Launches a single combat drone towards a destination anywhere in the Star System. The drone will automatically travel to the destination and stay there until destroyed or its activation timer runs out.\n\nDoes not work on sectors with Jump Gates on White Stars.

Name: Bond
Description:
Creates a movement link with the targeted enemy ship. While the link is active, the enemy ship is unable to move independently. Any movement from the owner ship will be reflected on the enemy ship, so that the distance between the two ships always remains the same.

The owner ship will not be affected by a Barrier field activated by the enemy ship.

The enemy ship can break free from the link earlier by using Bond on the original ship, or a module that causes teleportation.

Does not work on public Red Star level 7 or lower. A ship that has a Cerberus under BOND influence cannot teleport in a public Red Star.

Does not work against Cerberus Storm.

Name: DeltaRocket
Description:
A very fast Rocket that does Area damage to all enemy ships when it reaches its final destination. Can pass through Barrier. The owner can optionally set a second waypoint after the launch.

Enemy ships can fire on the Rocket using normal targeting rules. No damage is applied if the rocket is destroyed before it reaches its destination.

Does not work on sectors with Jump Gates on White Stars.

Name: BlastShield
Description: Protects the owner ship and all friendly ships within range against Area damage only. Direct weapon damage is not absorbed by this shield and is applied directly to the hull of the ship.

Name: OmegaRocket
Description: A strong, slow Rocket that can be launched within a limited range and does massive Area damage to all enemy ships when it reaches its destination.\n\nEnemy ships can fire on the Rocket using normal targeting rules. The Rocket still delivers a small amount of Area damage on a smaller radius to enemy ships if neutralized before reaching its destination.

Name: DestroyerVengeance
Description: Starts activating automatically when the owner ship drops below the Hull Strength Threshold. Once the Activation Delay passes, and if the owner ship is still not destroyed, a massive explosion will apply Area damage to all enemy ships in range.

Name: MiningDrone
Description: Launches an independent ship towards the target asteroid, which must be within range of miner ship. The drone will keep mining from the asteroid until it is depleted or its capacity fills up. After the mining is done, the drone will deposit the Hydrogen to the closest planet and self destruct.

Name: BomberLauncher
Description: Launches one Bomber Rocket towards each enemy player that has ships in the Bomber's sector or any adjacent sectors. Each Rocket travels towards the enemy player's closest ship.

Name: ColossusLaser
Description: A powerful weapon that does increasingly higher damage the longer it stays focused on a single target.

Name: DartLauncher
Description:
Launches a DART missile against the targeted enemy ship at regular intervals.

The missile can be neutralized by any enemy ship using normal targeting rules.

When the missile reaches its destination it will apply direct weapon damage to the target ship only, and only if the target ship is still within the impact area.

This weapon will only fire on enemy ships. Rockets and Cerberus stations are ignored.

Name: Dispatch
Description: The Transport ship initiates teleport to the planet with the most items (Shipments, Artifacts or Relics) in the star system. If more than one planets have the same amount of items, the farthest planet is picked.\n\nThe Teleport completes after the preparation time elapses. The preparation time is proportional to the amount of items on the target planet at the time of activation.

Name: DartBarrage
Description: Regularly fires a fast Dart missile against all enemy ships in range.

Name: HydrogenRocket
Description: Allows the Miner ship to launch a powerful Rocket, anywhere in the star system.\n\nTo activate, the Miner ship must have collected at least the Required Hydrogen amount. The Hydrogen is consumed on activation.

Name: InterceptorMBattery
Description: Simultaneously fires on multiple enemies within firing range.

Name: Suspend
Description: Slows down time in a large area around the ship. Reduces the effectiveness of Time Warp within the effect area.\n\nAn object in range of multiple Suspend areas is only affected by the highest level one.

Name: Recoil
Description: The Flagship enters a Teleport countdown, heading anywhere in the star system. After the countdown ends, the Flagship will jump to the destination and will immediately enter a second Teleport countdown, heading back to its original position.

Name: Immolation
Description: Instantly destroys all Cerberus ships in the sector.

Name: EMPRocket
Description: A Rocket that disables all nearby ships on impact.

Name: HydraBarrage
RemoteBomb
Description:
Leaves a stationary Bomb at the ship's current location. The bomb will start triggering once an enemy ship enters the blast range. All enemy ships within the blast range will take area damage after the trigger period is over. The bomb can be targeted by enemy ships using regular targeting rules. If neutralized before the trigger period expires, it will apply less area damage across a smaller range.

Not affected by Area damage.

Not useable in Yellow stars.

Name: RelicDrone
Description: The Drone will travel to the target planet and start loading Relics until the planet is empty or its capacity is full. It will then automatically travel to the Jumpgate and jump out of the system, depositing the Relics to your Corporation.\n\nUpgrading increases the Drone's Relic capacity and reduces the time it takes to load a Relic.

Name: FlagshipWeaponModule
Description: A stand-alone weapon with a fixed position that can be deployed from the Corporation Flagship. It will regularly launch a Dart rocket against each enemy ship in range. The Dart rocket will only do damage against its single target, and only if the target is within blast range when it reaches its destination.

Name: FlagshipShieldModule
Description: A stand-alone Area shield with a fixed position that can be deployed from the Corporation Flagship. Absorbs hull damage taken by any allied ship or rocket in the effect area, including Transports and Miners.

Name: FlagshipDartBarrage
Description: A stand-alone weapon with a fixed position that can be deployed from the Corporation Flagship. It will regularly launch a Dart rocket against each enemy ship in range. The Dart rocket will only do damage against its single target, and only if the target is within blast range when it reaches its destination.
s

Name: FlagshipAreaShield
Description: A stand-alone Area shield with a fixed position that can be deployed from the Corporation Flagship. Absorbs hull damage taken by any allied ship or rocket in the effect area, including Transports and Miners.
